body: @ppwwyyxx Thanks for taking a look. Can you elaborate? I have the same problem using any of `tf.round`, `tf.floor`, `tf.ceil`, and `tf.cast(a, tf.int32)`, but the gradient is fine (i.e. not `None`) when I cast it to a floating type. Why shouldn't it work when casting it to an integer?
